pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a set of Python bindings for the libsmbclient libraryfrom the samba project.>>> # Directory listing example:>>> import smbc>>> ctx = smbc.Context (auth_fn=my_auth_callback_fn)>>> entries = ctx.opendir ("smb://SERVER").getdents ()>>> for entry in entries:... print entry<smbc.Dirent object "music" (File share) at 0x7fbd7c42b3a0><smbc.Dirent object "IPC$" (IPC share) at 0x7fbd7c42b148><smbc.Dirent object "Charlie" (Printer share) at 0x7fbd7c42b3c8>>>> d = ctx.open ("smb://SERVER/music")>>> # Write file example:>>> import smbc>>> import os>>> ctx = smbc.Context (auth_fn=my_auth_callback_fn)>>> file = ctx.open ("smb://SERVER/music/file.txt", os.O_CREAT | os.O_WRONLY)>>> file.write ("hello")>>> # Read file example:>>> import smbc>>> ctx = smbc.Context (auth_fn=my_auth_callback_fn)>>> file = ctx.open ("smb://SERVER/music/file.txt")>>> print file.read()hello
